input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Custom Photo Engraved Bracelet"
Reference Product Description:
This beautiful bracelet allows for a adjustable size - to fit all wrists!
Held together by a rounded box chain, with a round photo charm attached at the center.
This new stylish bracelet is perfect for any gift or occasion.
All photos are 100% lifetime guaranteed.
Item can be engraved with message, names, dates or monogram.
Engraving doesn't delay your shipment.
Picture Engraving is scratch and water resistant and included in the price.
One Size Fits All

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Sterling Silver Petite Heart Photo Charm'
  - Name='Miraculous Bangle Bracelet in Gold Plated'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Petite Round Photo Engraved Charm'
  - Name='Sterling Silver/Gold Black Leather ID Bracelet'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Custom Fingerprint Heart Bracelet'
  - Name='Heart Shaped Photo Charm'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Fingerprint Heart Charm'
  - Name='San Damiano Women's Adjustable Gold Vermeil Bracelet'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Petite Rectangle Diamond Cut Edge Photo Pendant Necklace'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Diamond Cut Photo Picture Pendant Necklace'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Oval Fingerprint Bangle Bracelet'
  - Name='MyKids Girl with Photo Pendant Necklace and Charm Jewelry in Sterling Silver | Picturesongold'
  - Name='Stainless Steel Photo Dog Tags Necklace'
  - Name='Shutterfly Engraved Heart Cuff'
  - Name='Famliy Photo Bracelet'
  - Name='Crystal Halo Photo Charm'
  - Name='Custom Engraved Pet Portrait Bracelet'
  - Name='Handmade Minimalism Photo Projection Charm Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Projection Heart Bracelet'
  - Name='Birthstone Bracelet'
  - Name='Letter Name Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Human Portrait Bracelet'
  - Name='Children's ID Heart Bracelet (2 Lines)'
  - Name='Stainless Steel Diamond ID Bracelet for Men'
  - Name='14K Two-Tone Gold Curb Chain ID Bracelet'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Petite Heart Photo Charm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a photo charm similar to the engraved photo charm on the bracelet, but it is a charm alone rather than a full bracelet with adjustable sizing, making it somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Miraculous Bangle Bracelet in Gold Plated
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a bangle bracelet but lacks indication of photo engraving or charms, making it less relevant to a custom photo engraved bracelet.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Petite Round Photo Engraved Charm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A small round photo engraved charm closely matches the photo charm aspect of the reference product though it may not be a full bracelet itself.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver/Gold Black Leather ID Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An ID bracelet may share personalization features but leather construction and no mention of photo engraving reduce relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Custom Fingerprint Heart Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It is a personalized engraved bracelet (fingerprint instead of photo) and shares the bracelet and engraving aspect, so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Heart Shaped Photo Charm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A photo charm with heart shape is relevant to the photo charm feature but it lacks the full bracelet context and adjustable size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Fingerprint Heart Charm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to fingerprint bracelet but only a charm, no bracelet, so less relevant than full bracelet but shares personalization feature.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: San Damiano Women's Adjustable Gold Vermeil Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Adjustable bracelet but no mention of photo engraving or charms, so less relevant to custom photo engraved bracelet.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Petite Rectangle Diamond Cut Edge Photo Pendant Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a necklace pendant with photo engraving, not a bracelet, reducing relevancy despite photo engraving.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Diamond Cut Photo Picture Pendant Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A necklace pendant with photo engraving, so only remotely similar due to personalization, less relevant than bracelets.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Oval Fingerprint Bangle Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A bangle bracelet with fingerprint engraving shares personalized engraved jewelry aspect but not photo engraving or adjustable sizing.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MyKids Girl with Photo Pendant Necklace and Charm Jewelry in Sterling Silver | Picturesongold
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo pendant and charm necklace jewelry; similar photo personalization but different jewelry type (necklace versus bracelet).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Stainless Steel Photo Dog Tags Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo engraved dog tag necklace shares photo personalization but differs substantially in product type and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Shutterfly Engraved Heart Cuff
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It's a cuff bracelet with engraving (presumably personalized), similar in jewelry type and engraving but may not feature photo engraving or charms.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Famliy Photo Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Name indicates a photo bracelet linked closely to the reference productâ€™s concept of custom photo engraved bracelet, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Crystal Halo Photo Charm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A photo charm with crystal accents is relevant to the photo charm aspect, but no bracelet context lowers relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Engraved Pet Portrait Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A bracelet that is custom engraved likely with a pet portrait aligns closely with the custom photo engraved bracelet concept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Handmade Minimalism Photo Projection Charm Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A charm bracelet with photo projection feature closely relates to photo charm bracelet but has a different photo feature style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Projection Heart Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar personalized photo projection heart bracelet aligns well with photo engraved bracelet concept with a heart charm and photo personalization.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Birthstone Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A birthstone bracelet is a personalized jewelry item but unrelated to photo engraving or charms, so low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Letter Name Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Personalized with letters/names but lacks photo engraving and charm focus, so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Human Portrait Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom engraved bracelet featuring human portrait photo aligns very closely with reference product features and concept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Children's ID Heart Bracelet (2 Lines)
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An ID bracelet with engraving on a heart shape is moderately relevant due to personalized engraving but no photo engraving or charm details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Stainless Steel Diamond ID Bracelet for Men
scores_with_rationales.rationale: ID bracelet with engravings but steel material, probably more masculine style, and no mention of photo engraving reduces relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 14K Two-Tone Gold Curb Chain ID Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Curb chain ID bracelet lacks photo engraving or charm, mostly focus on traditional ID bracelet, less relevant.
